channel.title: Modern on Sanchit's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Modern on Sanchit's blog

item.title: Apache Airflow - from Zero to Hero
item.description:
Apache Airflow - from Zero to Hero

Overview

  • In this webinar, we’ll discuss the factors to consider, the difficulties to overcome while running a custom Orchestration tool at scale, and how Apache Airflow comes to the rescue.

  • To begin, let’s discuss what it means to run Airflow at a large scale. The constructs of the Airflow architecture, Scheduler procedures, and configuration options will then be thoroughly discussed.

  • After that, we’ll discuss how Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA) helps simplify the complexity of open-source Apache Airflow and the additional security features it offers.

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2022 - Reinvent your business with an AWS modern data strategy
item.description:
AWS re:Invent 2022 - Reinvent your business with an AWS modern data strategy (PEX308)

Overview

  • AWS can help organizations quickly get answers from data by providing mature and integrated analytics services ranging from cloud data warehouses to serverless data lakes. Join this session to learn about AWS modern data architecture and how AWS analytics services can help your customers navigate data challenges, optimize analytics processes, and deliver insights to their businesses faster. This session also includes customer case studies and a demo of a modern data platform using AWS analytics serverless services with real-world streaming data.

item.title: AWS Summit India 2022 - Build a data lake with AWS Lake Formation
item.description:
AWS Summit India 2022 - Build a data lake with AWS Lake Formation

Overview

  • Organisations are breaking down data silos and building petabyte-scale data lakes on AWS to democratise access to thousands of end users. Since its launch, AWS Lake Formation has accelerated data lake adoption by making it easy to build and secure data lakes.

  • In this session, we explore data lake challenges and how AWS Lake Formation can help you. If you’re a developer, DBA, or a data engineer who works with data, this session is for you.
